name: Little Red Hacker
description:
Made for a 32-hour jam!

Controls

You move with WASD and you can shoot to the mouse position with left click. There is a barricade that will show a binary code when near, once you are near it just write the code either with numpad or normal numbers and hit return/enter once you are finished with it to check if it is wrong or right. If you want to reset the input you can also hit return/enter. Also, every bullet counts because you will start each level with the same amount you had from the previous one.
